thread.title: BRIEF-Inner Mongolia Yili Industrial Gets Approval To Issue 16 Bln Yuan Medium-Term Notes, Commercial Paper

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Inner Mongolia Yili Industrial Gets Approval To Issue 16 Bln Yuan Medium-Term Notes, Commercial Paper

organizations.name: inner mongolia yili industrial group co ltd

text:
March 9 (Reuters) - Inner Mongolia Yili Industrial Group Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT GETS APPROVAL TO ISSUE 8.0 BILLION YUAN ($1.26 billion) MEDIUM-TERM NOTES, 8.0 BILLION YUAN COMMERCIAL PAPER Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2FulpuM Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3346 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
